metadata.description: The name for the function app that you wish to create
UTC timestamp used to create distinct deployment scripts for each deployment

properties.scriptContent: [format('echo "$CONTENT" > {0} && cat {1} | base64 -d > {2} && az storage blob upload -f {3} -c {4} -n {5}', variables('tempfilename'), variables('tempfilename'), parameters('filename'), parameters('filename'), variables('discoveryContainerName'), parameters('filename'))]
